price: 37. Qofkuu hanuuniyona ma jiro wax lumin kara. Miyuusan Alle ahayn Adkaade, Aargudasho leh?
arabic: وَمَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٖ ذِي ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman yahdi al-lahu famā lahu min muḍillin alaysa al-lahu biʿazīzin dhī intiqāmin
